text: The existing Medicare system does, yes. The Med4All legislation does not.
author: MKTWgoldstein

text: I’m not debating the UK or Australian system or suggesting some version can’t be applied in U.S. But I am saying the Sanders bill, endorsed by x number of presidential candidates, and the basis for NYT article, isn’t that system.
author: MKTWgoldstein
